about.title: About the Artist
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind Matthew James Gallery
about.artistLocation: English artist based in Bergen, Norway
about.statement1: Matthew James is an English artist based in Bergen, Norway. His work blends modern expressionism with a dry sense of humour, capturing the strange beauty of everyday life. Faces, cities, and fleeting moments appear in bold colour and loose form, always honest, sometimes ironic but never overthought.
about.quote: I paint because I have to. Most of the time I start without knowing how it will finish. The process decides the outcome, I just follow where the colour leads.
about.statement2: Each painting carries a touch of spontaneity and wit, often revealing its story only after it's finished. The result is a body of work that feels alive, human, and slightly unpredictable, much like the artist himself.
about.step1Text: Each painting begins without a predetermined outcome, allowing the process to guide the creation.
about.step2Text: Bold colours and loose forms emerge naturally, revealing the story as the painting develops.
about.step3Text: The true meaning and narrative often becomes clear only after the work is complete.
about.bergen1: Bergen, Norway serves as both home and muse for Matthew James. The city's dramatic landscapes, ever-changing weather, and vibrant cultural scene provide endless inspiration for his work.
about.bergen2: Much like his paintings, Bergen is alive, human, and slightly unpredictable, a perfect match for an artist who embraces spontaneity and follows where the colour leads.
about.exploreText: Discover the spontaneous beauty and honest expression in Matthew James's artwork collection.

shipping.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping.subtitle: All artworks are shipped safely, fully insured, and carefully packed from Bergen, Norway. Each piece includes a certificate of authenticity and arrives ready to hang.
shipping.shippingDescription: All shipments include tracking, full-value insurance, and secure protective packaging. Larger works are sent in custom art boxes or wooden crates for extra safety.
shipping.insuranceDescription: Every artwork is fully insured for its sale value and packed to gallery standards, foam-lined, reinforced, and moisture-protected.
shipping.certificateDesc: Each artwork comes with a signed certificate proving its authenticity and provenance.
shipping.readyToHangDesc: All paintings arrive with hanging hardware attached and ready for immediate display.
shipping.professionalCareDesc: Each piece is handled with the same care and attention as gallery exhibitions.
shipping.returnsDescription: If your artwork arrives damaged, please get in touch within 7 days with photos of the packaging and piece. I handle each case personally and make sure replacements or refunds are arranged smoothly.
shipping.questionsText: Contact me directly for any shipping questions, custom arrangements, or special delivery requirements.
